Fair
28 Sep 2017 By Brynn Vaz On flipkart.com

Product is in no doubt very awesome ,and sleek looking . But the Flipkart delivery service at least in Goa is poor ,my address clearly states 1st floor ,they came with 4 men ,to lift a 105kg fridge and said that they couldn't lift it and needed 7men ,they said we going to leave it on the ground in your garage ,told us that their job is only to get it on the ground floor ,we had to motivate them using cash and that's when they were ready to take it up ,they even tore the box while doing this .I thought Flipkart delivery meant to deliver the product safely to my house ,but didn't come prepared with the equipment required to lift big appliances like this .

read more ▼
Terrific
22 Aug 2017 By Ambuj Agrawal On flipkart.com

Full marks to Flipkart and HITACHI for Price, Delivery and Installation. Will review the product in detail later after some months of usage. For now, the product is working absolutely fine.
